overview: A short documentary film providing an insight into the experiences of Dorset based band Galaxy Thief. We join them as they have started their very first headline tour across the UK, shortly after reaching 110k streams on their newly released EP. This 16-minute documentary uses both years of archive, as well as cinematic behind the scenes footage to tell their story as a band on the way up in the competitive music industry.
title: BETTER | A Galaxy Thief Documentary
